item.title: 美联储降息谨慎削弱需求，黄金连续第三天下跌
item.description: 黄金连续第三天下滑，原因是交易商对美联储未来降息持谨慎态度，加上美元走强，抑制了贵金属近期的大涨。【原文：Gold slipped for a third day, as traders’ caution over future Federal Reserve rate cuts, along with a stronger dollar, tempered the precious metal’s recent surge.】

item.title: 日本住房金融公司以 2023 年以来最宽利差出售人民币债券
item.description: 据主要管理人高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Japan Housing Finance Agency sold ¥50.2 billion ($340 million) of residential mortgage-backed securities at the widest spread in more than two years, according to lead manager Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 日本两年期政府债券收益率升至 2008 年以来最高点
item.description: 由于市场对日本央行今年可能加息的预期增强，日本两年期国债下跌，收益率升至 2008 年以来的最高水平。【原文：Japan’s two-year government bonds fell, pushing yields to the highest level since 2008 amid increased expectations that the central bank may raise interest rates this year.】

item.title: 加拿大、墨西哥承诺就与美国的贸易协定审查进行协调
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税威胁使加拿大和墨西哥的贸易协定面临风险，两国领导人承诺在明年对两国与美国的贸易协定进行高风险审查之前密切协调。【原文：The leaders of Canada and Mexico committed to close coordination ahead of next year’s high-stakes review of their trade pact with the US as President Donald Trump’s tariff threats put the accord at risk.】

item.title: 野村中国合资公司因劳资纠纷遭前高管起诉
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc.’s joint venture in China was sued by its former deputy head over labor issues, the latest setback for the firm in the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 印度高速交易公司向实习生开出月薪 1.4 万美元的条件
item.description: 高速交易公司正在迅速提高印度初级职位的薪酬，以应对全球最大股票衍生品市场的监管打击。【原文：High-speed trading firms are rapidly increasing pay for entry-level jobs in India, brushing off a regulatory crackdown on the world’s biggest equity derivatives market.】

item.title: 台湾在关键财富指标上领先韩国，台积电功不可没
item.description: 今年，台湾的财富将在二十多年来首次超过韩国，这标志着台湾半导体制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan is set to surpass South Korea this year in terms of wealth for the first time in over two decades, marking a shift in Asia’s economic ranks made possible by the ascent of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.】

item.title: CATL 股价在上涨 1100 亿美元后仍被认为便宜
item.description: 人们通常不会把 "便宜 "这个形容词与一支在几个月内几乎翻了一番的股票联系在一起。但这正是一些投资者对 Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.Ltd.【原文：Cheap isn’t an adjective one would typically associate with a stock that’s nearly doubled in a matter of months. But that’s exactly how some investors are describing Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd.】

item.title: 特朗普撤销刑期后，美国证券交易委员会撤销卡洛斯-沃森欺诈案
item.description: 小卡洛斯-沃森（Carlos Watson Jr.）是现已解散的 Ozy Media 公司的联合创始人，他因在数字初创企业中向投资者撒谎而被定罪，唐纳德-特朗普总统免除了他近 10 年的监禁。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission is dropping its fraud case against Carlos Watson Jr., the co-founder of now-defunct Ozy Media Inc. who was spared by President Donald Trump from an almost 10-year prison term after he was convicted of lying to investors in the digital startup.】

item.title: 苹果 iPhone 17 和 Air 上市销售，新外观满足多年需求
item.description: 在过去的四年里，一些苹果公司的用户一直在等待一种全新的设计，然后再购买新的 iPhone。现在时机已到，iPhone 17 Pro、iPhone 17 Pro Max 和 iPhone Air 将于周五上市。【原文：For the past four years, some Apple Inc. customers have been waiting for a fresh design before buying a new iPhone. The time has come for those consumers, with the iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max and iPhone Air going on sale Friday.】

item.title: 中国自 20 世纪 90 年代以来首次回避美国大豆，寻求贸易优势
item.description: 至少自 20 世纪 90 年代以来，中国首次在出口季节开始时没有购买任何美国大豆，这表明中国政府在与华盛顿的贸易斗争中再次将农业作为筹码。【原文：For the first time since at least the 1990s, China hasn’t bought any US soybeans at the start of the export season, a sign that Beijing is once again using agriculture as leverage in its trade fight with Washington.】

item.title: 三色受托人寻求控制 10 万笔次级汽车贷款
item.description: 监管破产的 Tricolor Holdings 公司的受托人正在寻求对该公司发放的约 10 万笔次级汽车贷款的控制权，希望将这些贷款置于法院监督之下，同时决定如何向债权人分配收益。【原文：The trustee overseeing bankrupt Tricolor Holdings is seeking control of roughly 100,000 subprime auto loans originated by the lender, looking to hold them under court supervision while determining how to distribute proceeds to creditors.】

item.title: 日本股市追随美国股市反弹，日本央行受到关注
item.description: 周五，日本股市跟随美国股市上涨，在美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）今年首次降息后，日本股市在乐观情绪的推动下创下新高。投资者还将关注日本央行稍后的利率决定。【原文：Japanese stocks gained on Friday following the US equity market whose gauges hit fresh highs on an upbeat mood after the US Federal Reserve delivered its first interest-rate cut this year. Investors will also be on the watch for the Bank of Japan rate decision later in the day.】

item.title: 美联储降息后美国企业债券利差创 27 年新低
item.description: 在美联储自2024年以来首次降息后，投资者竞相锁定仍然高企的收益率，衡量美国企业债券估值的一个关键指标达到了近三十年来最昂贵的水平。【原文：A key measure of US corporate-bond valuations reached the most expensive level in nearly three decades as investors raced to lock in still-elevated yields following the Federal Reserve’s first interest rate cut since 2024.】

item.title: 朗格表示不再寻求新任期，开始物色澳大利亚证券和投资委员会新主席
item.description: 在乔-隆戈（Joe Longo）宣布任期结束后不再寻求连任后，澳大利亚已开始物色下一任企业监督机构主席。【原文：Australia has started the search for the next chair of its corporate watchdog, after Joe Longo announced he won’t seek reappointment when his term ends.】

item.title: 日本央行会议前日本通胀因补贴大幅放缓
item.description: 受政府公用事业补贴的影响，日本消费者通胀速度骤然放缓，但仍远高于日本央行的目标。【原文：The pace of Japan’s consumer inflation slowed abruptly on the back of government utility subsidies while remaining well above the Bank of Japan’s target hours before authorities are set to decide policy.】

item.title: 三菱不动产支持的日本房地产投资信托基金考虑股票发行计划
item.description: 日本第二大房地产投资信托公司正在权衡一项计划，准备筹集数百亿日元新资金，用于购买高租金地区的办公楼，这表明人们对日本正在复苏的房地产市场产生了新的兴趣。【原文：Japan’s second-biggest real estate investment trust is weighing a plan to raise tens of billions of yen in new capital to buy office buildings in high-rent districts, signaling new interest in the nation’s reviving real estate market.】

item.title: 英国和爱尔兰将取代 "动乱 "法案以促进两国关系
item.description: 英国和爱尔兰政府将宣布一个新的框架，以处理北爱尔兰数十年宗派暴力 "动乱 "遗留下来的问题，这标志着英爱关系向前迈进了一步。【原文：The UK and Irish governments are set to announce a new framework to deal with legacy issues from decades of sectarian violence in Northern Ireland known as ‘The Troubles,’ marking a step forward in Anglo-Irish relations.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮推动日本最大保险公司项目贷款增长 11
item.description: 日本生命保险公司（Nippon Life Insurance Co., Ltd.）预计，由于美国和其他地区对人工智能数据中心的融资需求激增，其今年的海外项目融资贷款将攀升 11%，创历史新高。【原文：Nippon Life Insurance Co. sees its overseas project finance lending climbing 11% to a record high this year due to surging demand to fund AI data centers in the US and elsewhere.】

item.title: 墨西哥食品公司 Nutrisa 分拆后在当地交易所上市
item.description: 食品公司 Grupo Nutrisa SA de CV 从母公司 Grupo Herdez SAB 分拆后，在墨西哥最大的证券交易所上市。【原文：Food company Grupo Nutrisa SA de CV listed its shares on the largest Mexican stock exchange following a spinoff from parent Grupo Herdez SAB.】

item.title: Atlassian 将以 10 亿美元收购工程智能公司 DX
item.description: 两家公司在一份声明中表示，Atlassian 公司将以约 10 亿美元的现金和限制性股票收购工程智能公司 DX。【原文：Atlassian Corp. is set to buy engineering intelligence company DX for about $1 billion in cash and restricted stock, the companies said in a statement.】

item.title: 全球指数创下新高，亚洲股市上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在美国和全球股市指数创下新高之后，亚洲股市周五早盘开始上涨，因为宽松政策支持了看涨情绪。【原文：Asian stocks were primed for early gains Friday after US and global equity gauges hit fresh highs as easing policy supported bullish sentiment.】

item.title: 紫金矿业在 5 月以来全球最大 IPO 中筹资 32 亿美元
item.description: 紫金黄金国际股份有限公司（Zijin Gold International Co.【原文：Zijin Gold International Co. is seeking to raise HK$25 billion ($3.2 billion) for an initial public offering in Hong Kong that’s poised to be the world’s biggest deal of its kind since May.】

item.title: 电子商务公司 Pattern 拟以每股 14 美元的中间价进行首次公开募股
item.description: Pattern Group Inc.是一家在亚马逊等市场上转售商品的电子商务公司，据熟悉内情的人士称，该公司及其部分投资者将其首次公开发行股票的定价定为每股 14 美元，处于市场定价区间每股 13 至 15 美元的中间位置。【原文：Pattern Group Inc., an e-commerce firm that resells goods on marketplaces such as Amazon.com Inc., and some of its investors priced its initial public offering at $14 per share, in the middle of its marketed range of $13 to $15 per share, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 勒纳预测不尽如人意，建筑市场面临挑战
item.description: 建筑商莱纳尔公司（Lennar Corp.）对季度房屋订单的预测未能达到分析师的预期，原因是对经济承受能力的担忧和就业市场的动荡抑制了购房者的需求。【原文：Builder Lennar Corp.’s forecast for quarterly home orders missed analysts’ estimates as affordability concerns and the wavering job market keep a lid on buyer demand.】

item.title: 对冲美国 "贸易推动全球热衷于短线美元赌注
item.description: 事实证明，今年早些时候市场上出现的 "卖美 "情绪是错误的。【原文：It turns out that all the “Sell America” angst swirling in markets earlier this year was misplaced.】

item.title: 参议院作证后，OpenAI 就青少年安全风险接受调查
item.description: 美国一位重要的共和党参议员要求 OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）交出有关 ChatGPT 对儿童和青少年构成风险的文件和信息，从而扩大了国会对人工智能聊天机器人的调查。【原文：A key Republican US senator demanded OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman hand over documents and information about the risks ChatGPT poses to children and teens, expanding a congressional probe into artificial intelligence chatbots.】

item.title: 特朗普和习近平将举行通话，TikTok、关税和英伟达问题迫在眉睫
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国国家主席习近平周五的通话有望决定 TikTok 的命运，并有可能缓解世界两大经济体之间的贸易紧张局势。【原文：The call Friday between US President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping promises to determine the fate of TikTok — and potentially ease trade tensions between the world’s two biggest economies.】

item.title: PagSeguro 预计到 2029 年 12 月信贷组合将达到 250 亿巴西雷亚尔
item.description: 巴西 PagSeguro Digital 有限公司周四发布的一份公司简报显示，该公司预计到 2029 年 12 月，其信贷组合将增至 250 亿雷亚尔（合 47 亿美元）。【原文：Brazil’s PagSeguro Digital Ltd. expects its credit portfolio to grow to 25 billion reais ($4.7 billion) by December 2029, according to a company presentation on Thursday.】

item.title: 氧气公司高管称直接空气捕集模式现在无法获得银行支持
item.description: 美国西方石油公司（Occidental Petroleum Corp.【原文：Startups developing direct air projects will need to look beyond traditional financing models to scale the technology, according to the president of Occidental Petroleum Corp.’s carbon removal unit.】
